entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, who is being threatened by death. ("Bow to death, Harry.")

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, whose face appears in his mind. ("And their faces burst clearly into his mind as he fought for breath")

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's other friend, whose face also appears in his mind.

entities.name: dementor
entities.description: A dark creature that is attacking Harry. ("An enormous silver stag erupted from the tip of Harry’s wand; its antlers caught the dementor in the place where the heart should have been")

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Harry's cousin, who is curled on the ground and being attacked by a Dementor. ("He had run barely a dozen steps when he reached them: Dudley was curled on the ground, his arms clamped over his face")

relationships.description: Harry is being attacked by a Dementor. ("An enormous silver stag erupted from the tip of Harry’s wand; its antlers caught the dementor in the place where the heart should have been")
Harry is friends with Ron. ("And their faces burst clearly into his mind as he fought for breath")
Harry rescues Dudley from a Dementor. ("He had run barely a dozen steps when he reached them: Dudley was curled on the ground, his arms clamped over his face")
